message: The room is small and the decor simple, but it has a classy feel to it.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Better check him out."
I sit down on the bed and take Ren out of my bag.
I put him on my lap and start a diagnostic on my Coil.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let's see."
...Hmm. Everything looks fine.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I don't see anything wrong with you. Do you still feel weird?"

name: 蓮
message: "Hmm. It's difficult to describe, but something doesn't feel quite right."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I wonder what's causing it. Something inside, I guess."
Ren's breathing is back to normal, but I'm still worried.
I part his fluffy fur and check his body. Ren fidgets a bit like it tickles.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I guess it's not external damage...  Damn. If I'd been more careful..."

name: 蓮
message: "Your orders came faster this time."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, I did used to play, apparently. It still doesn't feel real, though... but it's like my instincts are starting to come back."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But that field was strange. Maybe it's because it was another ganking, or maybe that's just what it's like these days."

name: 蓮
message: "...Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hm?"

name: 蓮
message: "Please stop."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What is it? Is something wrong?"
I stop what I'm doing and look at him. He licks his nose like he wants to say something.

name: 蓮
message: "No, it's..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hm? What's wrong? Why don't you just tell me?"

name: 蓮
message: "I... feel strange. I don't know how else to describe it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh... I guess we're not gonna learn anything else unless I open you up. Have you noticed any issues in your basic functions?"

name: 蓮
message: "Not particularly."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Then maybe we should just wait and see... But you better tell me the moment anything changes, okay?"

name: 蓮
message: "Understood."
I close the diagnostic, pick up Ren, and hold him up to my face.
He gazes at me with those big, black, shiny eyes.
